xuiWizardStep
directive in module xui

Description

Component that provides wizard step functionality.

Dependencies

  • xuiWizard

Usage

as element:
<xui-wizard-step
       label="{string}"
       title="{string}"
       [short-title="{string}"]
       [description="{string}"]
       [next-text="{string}"]
       [on-enter="{expression}"]
       [on-exit="{expression}"]>
</xui-wizard-step>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
labelstring

The label that identifies the step.

titlestring

The title of the step.

shortTitle
(optional)
string

A more compact form of the title (ex: "EULA").

description
(optional)
string

The description of the step.

next-text
(optional)
string

Text for the Next button.

(default: 'Next')

on-enter
(optional)
expression

Evaluated when the step is entered.

on-exit
(optional)
expression

Evaluated when the step is exited.
